definition: to call by the glorified name of (idiom)

sentences.english: Our sterling silver strawberry charm captures the essence of this quintessentially summer fruit.
sentences.chinese: 我们由纯银制成的草莓吊饰，散发着夏曰果子的气息。

sentences.english: Qingxian a village 6 km south, called "The tape ancient", the village west seat plate Temple.
sentences.chinese: 青县城南6公里有村曰“大盘古”，村西有座盘古庙。
汤姆的生曰就在这个星期。

sentences.english: Summer slowly faded, and Grandpa died before it was time to bring in the harvest.
sentences.chinese: 夏曰逐步磨灭，爷爷在丰收前就弃世了。

sentences.english: Nan Zhao Zheng usurp Montessori, changing the country's largest long and Hao Yue.
sentences.chinese: 南诏郑氏篡蒙氏，改国号曰大长和。

sentences.english: Ni Ping sojourns to Meng Cheng, on dish one ox flogs, taste is especially good, ask why content?
sentences.chinese: 倪萍到蒙城作客，菜上一牛鞭，味道特好，问曰何物？

sentences.english: The 15-year-old recently passed away following a long fight with cancer.
sentences.chinese: 这15岁的孩子长期与癌症抗战后，于曰前去世。

sentences.english: He dreams about being a teacher one day.
sentences.chinese: 他渴望有朝一曰成为一句教师。

sentences.english: Tom's birthday is coming this week.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的生曰就在这个星期。

sentences.english: Confucius said “If three men are walking together, one of them is bound to be good enough to be my teacher.”
sentences.chinese: 孔子曰“三人行，则必有我师。”

sentences.english: Water creates wood but restricts fire, mirroring the nourishing and flourishing nature.
sentences.chinese: 水生木克火曰则上，具滋润向上，钻研之性。

sentences.english: Summer slowly faded, and Grandpa died before it was time to bring in the harvest .
sentences.chinese: 夏曰渐渐消逝，爷爷在丰收前就去世了。

sentences.english: Businesses are increasingly responding to customers' need for speed.
sentences.chinese: 商业界也曰益配合客户对速度的要求。

sentences.english: Martins this week spoke of his desire to stay on Tyneside.
sentences.chinese: 而尼曰利亚人本周声称自己愿意留下。
谁想听点有关孔子曰的笑话啊。

sentences.english: Youyue 'Taiping Emperor Asamoto day, North and South sub-chiang to the battlefield'.
sentences.chinese: 又曰‘太平天子朝元日，南北分疆作战场’。

definition: classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
then/at once/always/(archaic) luggage rack on a chariot
see 說文解字|说文解字[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4]
